choices: Panic and run out of the clinic!
Do as suggested, look for normal work for a Ord.
Find a Super Hero Team that might take you.
Leave the clinic and go back to normal life.
Someone inturrupts you.
1.content:
This is not a good day!
Your name is Lucy Marshall, twenty three, wants to be a fashion designer (or possibly a graphic artist) and has high hopes of making it in the industry! But you can't live on hopes alone and the last few months have been hard. You've spent more time with books at night, going over everything you can think of to help you get a leg up in the industry, to find the people that might help you get started, to improve your artwork for the designs themselves, and unfortunately have had to work days too. Recently it's been at a Mc Phearson Burger bar, and the work hours, combined with your research & training were starting to get to you... or you thought that was the reason for the aches, pains and muscle cramps.
When you went to your Doctor for something you were surprised at the result. He suggested you visit a Tau Clinic! You, visit a Super-Finder?
Well, after a lot of soul searching you made up your mind and went to the nearest one in the City of Burgsville. The last two hours have been spent in white walled rooms, filling in forms, getting blood tests, urine tests, skin tests, getting scanned, sensored, probed and anything else they could throw at you! It's been rough.
Now you are lying in a fairly comfy bed, alone in a small room wearing only a standard patient smock they gave you.
"Lucy?"
The voice snaps you from your mental wandering and you turn to see a female doctor enter. She isn't one of the doctors you've spoken to so far today. Why someone new all of a sudden?
"Yes, have you got the results yet?" you ask, expectantly.
The doctor doesn't smile, always a bad sign, and sits down by the bed before speaking, another bad sign.
"Miss Marshall, my name is doctor Ingerson. We've gone over the samples you've given us quite thoroughly and the Tau scan, MRI and xrays confirm the results. You may find this a little awkward. First, you do have Tau abilities, and they are a previously discovered pattern. We have mapped them before and have experience in their functioning."
You aren't sure whether to jump for joy or cringe in fear. It's obvious that there is something that the doctor isn't saying yet, something not pleasant!
"Please doctor, what is.. are my powers?"
Doctor Ingerson sighs then looks down at her tablet.
"Well, the combination is an odd one, not terribly common. Firstly you have an altered cellular structure, making your skin, muscles, flesh etc rather stretchy. Secondly any of your bone joints can dislocate painlessly, and several bones can part and move that normally don't, for example your ribcage can part in the middle. Thirdly your muscle structure has started to expand, in strength certainly, but also more muscle groups are forming, complete with nerve linkages. Forthly your bone structure in your torso, ie ribs, spine, hip bones etc, all have undergone a rather unusual reformation internally. They are gradually forming specialised cists that seem to distort the fabric of reality, bending space. The upshot of this is that the area contained within these bones, effectively the interior of your torso, is becoming larger on the inside than the outside."
At this you gasp. Stretching, yes you've heard of, dislocating bones, sure, better muscles, of course, but becoming larger inside than you are outside? That's weird!
Before you can interrupt the doctor continues.
"Fifthly your body has drastically altered how it metabolises food. The stomach is now almost useless for this purpose, and even the upper intestine. Now the middle and lower intestine absorb dead organic material, mainly meat, or high protein vegetable matter, directly into the intestinal wall. This has caused a drastic increase in efficiency of your digestive system and your body mass has already increased to slightly over two hundred and sixty pounds, and still rising."
"That's ridiculous!" you but in, "I weighed myself this morning and only weigh a hundred and twenty!"
The doctor smiles at you, the first freindly expression she's shown you so far.
"Quite correct, and it will remain somewhat similar. Weight isn't affected as the distortion your bones create also affects gravity. It doesn't however affect inertia and you will find that you have more difficulty in slowing down when you are moving. Your increased musculature will enable you to walk and run almost normally, even faster than normal despite your mass, but stopping after wards may be a challenge. Most of your extra mass is created as your body grows to fill the distorted cavity within your torso. Already the flesh, organs etc have become shaped to the odd curvature of space that fills your torso so you would no longer survive without the distortion. On the plus side all your vital organs are buried far deeper inside you than in a normal person, and also the extra weight, indeed any extra.. Ahem.. weight you gain will not show externally except on rather advanced scanners."
This is getting incredibly weird and you wonder if there's more. The doctor takes a breath before continuing and you realise there IS more!
"Finally you also have a drastically altered respitory system. Your body breaths more than usual, though you may not notice any difference in breathing pattern. You take in and store almost double the usual amount of oxygen in the blood, but also have reservoirs of air forming inside you that can allow you to hold your breath far longer. The respitory system seems also to be connected to an organ we have labelled a metabolic charger. Strictly speaking it takes part of your food that the body normally can't use and... compresses it with distortion similar to the fields that create the enlarged space within you. This creates huge releases of energy which then catalyses with carbon dioxide running through the respitory system that this organ weaves around, thus liberating more oxygen for you to breath. In short you will most likely be able to hold your breath almost indefinitely, and will actually have the air inside you regulated to stay breathable."
Most of what she just said made no sense to you at all, but never need to breath again? Weird!
The next few minutes pass almost in a blur, you vaguely hearing the doctor console you that you do not qualify for certain government programs, probably shouldn't apply to the usual acredited Super Hero training establishments, and some other things that seem equally pessimistic.
As far as you can tell the only thing you have is a slightly increased strength and would be more difficult to kill in the torso (though anyone planning on shooting your head wouldn't have to worry too much about you afterwards). The stretching doesn't stretch your bones so isn't much use to capture or subdue super villains. The brief visions you had of leaping or flying over the rooftops, defeating criminals disappear and you realise you are probably going to be an Ord, someone with Super power, but who leans an 'ordinary' life. You wonder what job that the powers you do have will help with?
Finally the doctor smiles, hands you some standard government leaflets of the regulatory issues regarding Supers, and leaves you to yourself.
What are you going to do?
1.title: First day of the rest of your life!

choices: Nothing! You'll have to look elsewhere.
The Eliminators Super Team catches your eye.
What's this? Suprettes, an all girl team nearby?
Perfect! A site describing exactly your powers!
You get an IM from someone about... vore?
13.content:
For a while you just lay there pondering on your fate. This is hardly the glossy image of supers portrayed on TV that you thought of. But surely this can't be it, can it? You do HAVE powers, even if they aren't particularly useful... or are they? Maybe you'd better talk to someone with experience in this sort of thing.
You think back to what the doctor said about not joining a Super Team. Well, maybe there are teams that would take you? It's worth a shot, and there ought to be one that has experience in your type of powers.
You buzz the nurse and ask if there is access to the internet in the building. Unfortunately they don't seem to be that accommodating so you spend the rest of the day waiting for them to finish the last few tests they seem to feel are important before letting you out.
Finally it's nearly 8 PM and you are heading home, tired, your ideals a little deflated, but still you ARE more than you thought you were this morning.
Once home you get on your computer and start surfing the Supers websites looking for obscure Super Teams that might take you.
13.title: Online Search

choices: Catch Slurpina away from the Team's base.
Go to the Team's HQ and see if they'll take you.
132.content:
They definitely are an interesting Super Team, one that seems to rely mostly on gadgets made by one of their members, as the others aren't very powerful. You almost skim over their site as you have dozens of others when your eye catches on one of the listed members; Slurpina.
Her listing describes her as being a living repository for their equipment as well as being tough, agile, and an expert in an obscure martial arts form. What catches your eye at first is her uniform. It's a one piece, figure hugging light blue uniform with a red oval around her mouth. Very odd to accentuate her mouth you think. After a little digging you find out why. She swallows objects and then regurgitates them for the group to use in battle. It seems she can hold a great deal of stuff without it showing in her figure.
That sounds just like your powers! She must be bigger on the inside too! Excited you get an address off the site and download a list of their members to go over.

Green Death - Leader of the group, owner of the Eliminator's base (a building on the outskirts of town with a well stocked basement apparently), and the most powerful of the group. He is a short stocky looking man, heavily built with a uniform that is mostly a light silvery green with dark green tunic, gloves and boots. He wears a one piece odd looking green helmet (definitely a custom job) with no apparent faceplate, making him look decidedly impersonal. They list his powers as Mental Communication (apparently consensual, so no use to read villains minds), 'Green Blast' - some sort of energy blast from his fists, and Enhanced Mass - which seems to make him more difficult to hurt. He also uses stun bombs and a flight belt built by their resident Genius...

Metal Freak - Their resident female Genius and maker of all their gadgets, tall, with very thick wavy blonde hair and wears dark goggles in the image as well as a grease covered lab coat. She apparently can understand any machinery in seconds if she can see the working parts (and notes she has made herself goggles to see inside machinery without taking it apart) and can produce incredibly complex equipment. She has no other powers but does go into battle wearing a suit of Power Armour she's built for herself which makes her tougher, stronger and includes laser guns in the arms.

Slurpina - A tall woman with the blue and red uniform you've already looked at. On further inspection she might not have exactly your powers. They don't list any kind of stretching in her abilities but note she can hold large gadgets. Presumably her mouth stretches to swallow something that big. She usually carries stun bombs and a vibro sword into combat and the listing notes her incredible agility and combat skills. Nothing here about being tougher to hurt or increased mass like you.

Captain Sky - A skinny looking guy wearing a gray flight suit with a flak vest on. He has a backpack on (again built by Metal Freak) with scanners which can make video recordings of battle, improves targeting for him, and an oxygen supply. He seems to wear a standard flight helmet with the mask connected to the backpack over his shoulder. His powers are Flight and Electrical Discharge - short range electrical blasts that knock people out.

Hmm, Slurpina certainly seems similar to you in some ways. Should you see if you can meet her on her own and ask about her powers? Maybe she has the other abilities you have but doesn't list them?
Or perhaps you should just go to the Team's headquarters?
132.title: The Eliminators

choices: You wait, but no-one leaves the building all night.
A figure leaves about midnight.
1321.content:
OK, you'd rather talk about this in private so best to catch Slurpina away from the other Supers.
You go to your wardrobe and take a look through your clothes. What to wear to make a good impression? Well, if you're trying to enter a Super Team probably something that at least has the Super style flair. Nothing you have looks like a super hero costume exactly, but you find a skin tight pink jogging suit. With a hair band you think you look at least presentable.
Driving out to the address of the team HQ you pick up a few snacks (you are getting more hungry recently you realise) to keep going for however long it would take. It was now almost ten at night and you hope you aren't too late to catch Slurpina before she leaves.
Parking up the road from the HQ you sit back and watch the entrance. The building is blockish, a little different from the other suburban buildings about here, but looks presentable. It has the Super Team logo above the entrance, simply a black oval with 'The Eliminators!' in yellow text inside. Very unoriginal! If you get in you'll do some redesigning for sure!
As you wait a thought occurs. You had assumed that Slurpina would head home, but she may sleep in the building.
"Well," you say to yourself "if She doesn't come out I guess I'd better go in. I'll keep watch for a little while just incase."
1321.title: Stake Out

choices: You get out of the car and call to him/her.
Drive up along side him/her.
13212.content:
It's difficult to stay awake, but you manage. By Eleven you've finished the meager snacks you brought and are still hungry. Can't head out though, you may miss something!
By twelve your belly is rumbling. The doc said your stomach didn't do anything now, but it feels like it wants to... or is that rumbling lower down? All you know is you do need something to eat and...
There! The main doors open and a figure steps outside. Tall so it can't be the Green Death, but you can't see much as he/she walks across the street.
13212.title: Someone Emerges

choices: Someone jumps you!
You see the person just ahead. Call out to him/her
132121.content: Getting out of your car and locking it you start jogging to catch up with the person you saw leaving. Who ever it is is walking pretty fast, but soon you are gaining ground. Then he/she turns a corner up ahead and is lost from sight. Hurrying you reach the corner and...
132121.title: Chasing

choices: It's Metal Freak.
It's Slurpina.
1321211.content:
Suddenly you are knocked to the ground, the wind knocked out of you. You get flashes of the person's body as they roll you over, grabbing your wrists, presumably so you can't fight back. Who is it?
You look over your shoulder and...
1321211.title: Caught!

choices: She asks you why you were following her.
She starts to eat you!
13212112.content:
... recognise the costume of Slurpina. Just who you were looking for!
"Ungh! Slurpina, I need to talk to you." you manage while the woman grabs your wrists.
At first she doesn't respond, then she stands up, moving out of your limited view as you try to peer over your shoulder.
13212112.title: Slurpina has you!

choices: Slurpina returns to HQ and coughs you up.
She rests against the wall with you inside her.
132121122.content:
You strain to see what she is doing, but can't turn your head enough to see her. Then she grabs your ankles and presses them together.
"What are you doing?" you manage, still trying to look backwards.
Shoes are plucked off you, and your socks, and you feel something slap against the soles of your feet, then all around your feet, something wet, springy and moving! Straining suddenly your neck gives a little 'crack' and your head rotates 180 degrees! You forgot about your dislocating bones! It didn't hurt but it does feel tight in your vertebrae. You peer back and gasp, seeing Slurpina's lips sliding around your calves! She's eating you!
For a few moments you freeze in shock, watching as she gulps repeatedly. You can feel the ripples of muscles as your feet are drawn into her throat, her lips gliding up over your knees. As she starts to work over your thighs you manage to break your brain freeze and desperately try to wriggle away. Unfortunately her throat muscles barely give at all, pinning you fast as she gulps again.
"Stop it! *Ungh* What are you doing? I just wanted to talk." you say, still struggling.
Slurpina doesn't respond, instead she slips her hands beneath your hips and hefts up, leaving your shoulders and head all that rests on the ground as she kneels before you, her mouth a tight ring around the top of your thighs.
It's incredible to watch, and watch you do with a kind of morbid fascination, as she tenses and swallows. You gasp as her lips and jaw work your rump into her mouth, her lips now near your waist. As you desperately reach down and try to grab her shoulders to stop your descent, a thought occurs to you. You can stretch and dislocate bones so could you do this? Swallow a person whole?
The thought spirals away as a liquid gulp squeezes and draws your hips into her throat while she slaps one of your hands against you, then shoves it alongside you into her maw. She switches hands, the other supporting herself on the ground, and does the same to your other hand, trapping both in her mouth.
Smiling around your slender waist She pushes forwards, your head and shoulders grinding against the cement ground, driving your abdomen into her mouth. This can't be happening!
Then she shifts, bringing one knee up, foot almost up to your back as she balances. She reaches down with both hands and slides them under your shoulders. As you watch her face you can see her tense, straining muscles as she heaves back, heaving you up into the air as she stands up. You wave about above her till she gets herself steady, then the tight flesh surrounding your body relaxes.
"EEEEP!" you gasp as you slide down rapidly, still held unbending inside her body as you drop.
Finally your breasts bounce against her lips, halting your descent. Immediately her muscles clamp down on you once more. She must be bigger on the inside than the outside otherwise your feet would have gone below her waist by now! Looking down confirms that. Her mouth and neck are swollen around your body, her collar bones can be seen bulging out where your waist enters her torso, but below that she looks normal. Very well built normal at that!
Further speculation is put aside as she reaches up and grabs your chest.
"Hey cut that... Ooooh!" you gasp as she firmly squeezes your chest and gradually mashes it down into her mouth, waddling the flesh into her. "Aaah! Please, sto.. Eep! Stop!" you gasp, feeling your nipples scrape over her teeth.
You can't believe the sensations as she gulps and presses, finally squeezing your chest into her mouth. You gasp for breath, then gasp as she gulps hard, your chest mashed tight into her throat, pushed back by her muscular tongue, her lips riding up over the back of your head and covering your mouth.
Here she pauses, and looking down see her patting her belly, which hasn't even bulged an inch! Slowly she makes little jerks with her head, sliding you in slowly. You watch as her lips push up over your nose, gradually covers your eyes. As your ears are swallowed you can hear the reverberating wet slurping and gulping as she eats you. Straining you tip your head back enough to look up a little, watching her teeth pass your nose, scraping over your forehead. Another gulp sucks you down a little more, her tongue pressing against your face, cheeks on either side, her palette scraping over your crown. The view up is the dark sky, framed by two slowly closing sets of teeth, the tongue writhing around, pressing up sharply. You get to see the teeth click together her tongue heaves back, squeezing down and a swallow gulping you into her throat.
Bones creak around you as you are squeezed down, your legs coming out into a chamber. It's tight in there, barely fitting your calves in, but it easily stretches as you enter.
Down and down you go, squished tight into the warm belly, finally plopping in and forced to curl up into a ball, panting hard.
Why did she do that? And why are you feeling so.. so... turned on? You blush bright red as you realise that being swallowed like that felt incredibly sexy! You wonder if it feels as good to swallow someone as it does to be swallowed.
132121122.title: Late Lunch

choices: Slurpina lets you out
Slurpina refuses for some reason
1321211221.content:
Your contemplation on whether you are capable of swallowing another person is forgotten as the chamber like stomach begins to shift around you.
“Uuh,” you grunt out unlady like as the rhythmic movements of Slurpina’s steps move your body from side to side. When your elbow shoves into the walls of the stomach the flesh pushes out a few inches before it returns to its original shape. You thank God that your not claustrophobic because soon you feel the stomach tighten a little causing you to be further pushed into the fetal position. Your knees rest against your temples as you breath in the humid stale air of the stomach. For a second you fear that you might suffocate. Then you remember that the ability to live without breathing is one of the numerous powers that you have gained. Besides, now that you think about it you do feel air seeping out from the opening of the stomach ever so often. Seeing no reason to fear, you rest your eyes and let the sound of Slurpina’s heart lull you into a relaxed state.
Underneath the sound of Slurpina’s heart you can also hear the slightly muffled sound of the outside world. You hear a door opening then closing, and then the sound of feet echoing on floorboards and ever so often vibration of your current internments breathes. All these sounds help you further to fall into a meditative state. You are jolted out of your state as you feel something brush against your groin. Looking down, you see that it is actually your hand that had mysteriously slipped down to your slightly wet opening all by itself. ‘Why would it do that? ‘ You wonder as you slowly lift your hand away from your crotch.
“I sure hope that’s a mugger or super villain.” Came a commanding voice from outside the stomach. The sound makes your head spring up and bump into the flexible lining of the stomach. You rub your head, not that the stomach hurt it but more out of habit.
“It could be a mugger. I was to hungry to ask her.” The nonchalant voice of Slurpina vibrates around you. She thinks I’m a mugger? No wonder she tried to eat me.
“SHE! Then that means she defiantly isn’t a mugger.” Came the same commanding voice from earlier.
“What’s that supposed to mean Green Death. You don’t think a woman can be a mugger? After all the women super villains we’ve fought, you have trouble believing that a woman can be a criminal. That’s so sexist of you.” A woman’s voice responds to the first voice, which you assume belongs to the leader Green Death.
“I took her shoes off before eating her.” Said Slurpina. You hope that they don’t think you’re a criminal or you can be in serious trouble. You don’t know if Slurpina can digest people yet but this isn’t the best way to find out.
“Let me have a look at those Slurpina.” After a moment the voice continued speaking. “High heels. Not the type of footwear of your average mugger.” You are so relieved to hear this that you miss what is said next. You return to listening to what is being said when you hear a third voice start to talk.
“Slurpina, you need to let her out now. We can’t deal with another law suit for sexual harassment like last time.” They say with a wary tone.
“But this time I didn’t suck anything improper more then I sucked the rest of her body.” Slurpina says in her defense. You feel a blush come over you as you imagine Slurpina slowly devouring you again, only doing it while licking at your chest and crotch. This time you stop your hand from lowering to your midsection.
“It doesn’t matter how much you focus on a certain area. One word about you stuffing her breast into your mouth to a lawyer and you can kiss your paycheck goodbye. Now spit her up and hopefully we can all avoid a messy lawsuit.” The voice of Green Death strictly told Slurpina. When you heard that you were going to be leaving the stomach you didn’t know whether to be relieved or sad. This place was starting to grow on you.
1321211221.title: Meeting the team..... sort of

choices: Come clean about you and Slurpina's Powers.
Claim to be a fan, deny you have Powers
13212112211.content:
"You really know how to spoil a bit of fun Greeny!" Slurpina's somewhat echoey voice responds. "OK OK, no need to give me 'The Look'! Jeesh!"
Suddenly your world rocks and squeezes and the tiny opening you came by opens wide. Before you've even registered it your head is half way up her throat, her stomach's contractions jamming you up tightly.
This is much quicker than your descent and you don't even get the chance to straighten your legs. You feel the rack of teeth over you and bright light floods in on you as you collapse in a wet heap on the floor.
"Almost as nice on the way up too." comes Slurpina's voice above you.
Looking up you see her smiling face peering down at you, mask covering it, the red oval over her mouth looking rather wierd, almost like a clown mouth. She winks at you and licks her lips.
"Surpina!" Comes that commanding tone again. "Cut it out!"
You turn and see the owner of the voice, obviously the Green Death. He has removed his helmet revealing a short cut bearded face and crew cut hair framing a very severe looking face. His costume is just as the website showed it, but they didn't do one aspect of him justice.
He's a little under four foot tall!
Somehow, despite his height, he practically radiates authority. There is no doubt who is the boss here.
"Hey, the john's backed up again, where's Freak?" comes from across the room where a wirey kid walks in. He notices you and grins "Oh, hey there! Take the scenic route in huh?"
"No Scott," Responds Green Death without turning, "I haven't seen Freak in a while. I think she's working in her lab." Then he leans over and offers you his hand.
"Erm, thanks." You manage, accepting his assistance in standing, then you notice all the saliva soaked into your jogging suit. "Damn, only got this thing a few weeks ago!"
Green Death stares at you for a few rather uncomfortable seconds, while Slurpina and the kid (must be Captain Sky) head over to the side of the room. Glancing around you realise for the first time that this seems to be a cafeteria.
"Now," Green Death says, interrupting your train of thought. "Perhaps you could tell us your name and why you came here? It's obvious your attention was on us, or one of us at least."
A chuckle comes from Slurpina.
"Oh I attract all the cute chicks!"
Captain Sky just shakes his head.
G.D. is waiting for an answer, so what'll you tell him?
13212112211.title: Fresh air once more.

choices: Join
Tell them you'll think about it
132121122111.content:
You relent your story about why you have been seeking out Slurpina to the three superheroes. Your careful not to leave anything out to them. After all you don’t want them accusing you of lying, these people deal with dangerous villains daily. When you’re halfway through telling them everything that the Doctor told you word for word, Slurpina interrupts you.
“How about instead of telling us your life story you break it down to a few sentences. I have to get home soon or the traffic’s going to be killer.”
Taking a deep breath, you realize that you had been blathering. “The Doctor told me I had powers similar to Slurpina. I can stretch my internal organs to great lengths and relocate my bones without pain.” You tell this to them while staring at them intently. You can see no reaction on Captain Sky and Green Death except a raised eyebrow from the leader; Slurpina on the other hand looks the complete opposite. A grin had spread from ear to ear and you can see a peculiar glint in her eyes that puts you on edge. No one speaks for a moment as you fidget with the corner of your wet jogging suit. Finally Green Death clears his voice and ends the silence.
“It’s not that we think your lying, but if you would let me I could like to scan your mind to see if your story is true.” He tries to say this while sounding as cool as possible with the suggestion of invading your mind. You hoped he would suggest this so you eagerly nod your head.
He closes his eyes and after a split second he reopens them. “She’s telling the truth.” When he’s done speaking your forced to the ground as a squealing Slurpina tackles you to the floor in a bear hug. You feel her heaviness on you, while her arms tightly wrapped around your torso. The soft weight of her breasts make your heart beat faster and you desperately struggle to get the affectionate girl off you. You see Captain Sky try to pry her off but he is unable to lift Slurpina for some reason. You figured he would be stronger. All the while you hear Slurpina whispering in your ear.
“We can be like sisters. I’ll teach you all my tricks. I can’t wait to go out on the town with you, we’ll have so much fun Sweet cheeks.” Finally Green Death pulls Slurpina off you, leaving you in a blushing heap on the floor. What did she mean when she called you sweet cheeks? Hopeful it was a nickname and not a description of your flavor.
Green Death gives Slurpina one final nasty look before turning to you.
“Sorry about Slurpina, she gets a little excited. I think your powers would come in very handy in our line of work. If you want there is a place on our team for you.”
132121122111.title: Be all that you can be

choices: Go with Slurpina, you wanted answers.
You'd better get a nights sleep before talking with Slurpina.
1321211221111.content:
You have trouble forming a coherent thought when Green death is finished. You didn’t think it would be so easy to join a super team. Everyone is looking at you with interest, especially Slurpina. It looks like she’s going to jump at you again, but as if reading her mind (which he probably did) Green Death shoots Slurpina another nasty look. This is the moment of truth, you realize. The decision you make now will change your life forever. Place your life at risk and put your dreams of becoming a fashion designer (or possibly a graphic artist) on hold or go back to working at Mc Phearson Burger bar where the only thing more rawer then the hamburgers is your butt after work and continue pursuing a dream that seems impossible. Not a very hard choice.
“Mr. Death sir, I’d be honored if I could join your prestigious team.” You say in your best military voice.
“Glad to have you on board.” He says, and then turns to leave. Before he reaches the door he shouts out one more thing. “Be here at eight hundred hours sharp. We’ll get the paper work signed and you’ll officially become a member of the Eliminators.” Then he is gone.
Slurpina walks over to you, instinctually you cringe expecting another flying tackle hug but instead she puts a gloved hand on your shoulder and looks you in the eyes. For the first time you notice that her eyes are green, you hadn’t noticed it while looking at her picture on the Internet. Her eyes hold an ancient look to them that speak of someone who has seen things in her short lifetime that most people will never experience. Your marvel at her eyes and slowly drifts away in your mind.
“Don’t mind the green dwarf.” She says with a wide smile. “He had to leave so he could do his happy leprechaun dance where no one could see him.”
“Huh?” You ask unintelligently.
“You probably don’t know this but my powers are in much demand in the super hero business and up till now I was the only listed super hero with the ability to do vore.” Slurpina finishes, slowly shaking her head then turning to look at Captain Sky. “Do you mind leaving? This is girl talk.”
Captain Sky hastily starts to draw back. “Don’t worry about me I’m leaving. It was nice meeting you and by the way now that you’re joining the team you aren’t planning any legal action for any of Slurpina’s earlier actions…”
“I said bugger off!” A fuming Slurpina says with barley suppressed growl. Captain Sky scampers off to join Green Death in the other room, leaving you alone with Slurpina.
“Honestly, He should have stayed a lawyer and leave the super heroing to the real heroes.” Turning to you, her happy go lucky smile returns. “Why not head back to my place where I can answer all your questions.”
You don’t know what to say. Everything is going so fast, this morning you were a struggling girl with a minimum wage job and now you’re a super hero, talking with a women who not ten minutes ago swallowed you whole. Part of you trusts Slurpina because you share similar powers but another part is afraid of her and the feelings she gives you.
1321211221111.title: New best friend

choices: Tell her your name

13212112211111.content:

Why did Slurpina say that Captain Sky should have stayed a lawyer? Could you swallow people whole like Slurpina? And what is this vore thing that Slurpina mentioned earlier? You have to find out these answers before you can even start thinking about sleep. Sigh, this is going to be a long evening.
“Lead the way Slurpina, but no funny business. I don’t know what you think but some people don’t like being swallowed randomly.” This is your failed attempt to impersonate the commanding tone of Green Death, but you end up sounding more like a bossy third grade teacher trying to discipline a child. Slurpina just giggles at you and hastily nods her head. You have to wonder why you agreed to go with this oddball in the first place.
As you head out of the Eliminators headquarters you notice that Slurpina is walking funny, you wonder if it has something to do with her powers. Slurpina turns to you with her big red lined mouth in a big smile. Can this girl make any other facial expressions other then a smile?
“Since you have a car would you mind giving me a ride to my apartment. I was going to walk but since you’re here why not give a fellow vore user a ride home.” She says while sifting her eyes into a very convincing pair of puppy dog eyes. Before you know it your answering her.
“Sure Slurpina.” Then everything that she said sinks in. “What’s a vore user?” you stutter out to a surprised Slurpina. Slurpina just looks at you for a second then her surprise shifts into a smile. Only this smile is different then her previous one. This smile you have seen previously when you first announced your powers.
“You’re a complete green horn to this, aren’t you? I can’t wait to mold you into a copy of me.” Slurpina begins to slip into another world, as you start to notice a bit of drool beginning to build up in her mouth you decide to try to break her out of it.
“Um, Slurpina, we better get going, people are starting to stare.” Slurpina awakes from her fantasies with a shake of her head that causes a little of her saliva to spill onto the ground.
“Sorry Sweet Cheeks got a little distracted back there. You should know though that the reason people are staring isn’t because of me. It’s because of you.” Slurpina punctuates her words by poking her finger lightly into your chest.
“Why would they be staring at…” You never get to finish because you look down and see that Slurpina’s finger has pulled away from your chest all wet. You look down to see that your pink Jump suit has become skin tight from the moister you received from your trip down Slurpina’s gullet. It’s no wonder you were feeling cold.
“Eppp!” You let out as you dash to your car and leap inside in a vain attempt to keep your modesty. All the while your doing this, Slurpina is laughing her ass off in the parking lot.
Eventually Slurpina pulls herself together and calmly walks to your car. She slides up beside you and puts a hand on your soggy shoulder. Slurpina’s lucky that you don’t have death ray vision because you would be killing Slurpina a thousand times over with the intensity of the stare your giving her.
“Rule one of vore etiquette, always take into consideration your appearance after being swallowed.” Slurpina just grins at you completely oblivious to your anger. “By the way, you only have to call me Slurpina while we’re on the job or in the bedroom. Other wise just call me Suzy.” She puts her hand out so you can shake her hand, but when your hands touch Slurpin… err I mean Suzy, she pulls you in till you’re nose to nose. “Now that you know my secret identity why not reveal your real name? Unless you want me to keep calling you sweet cheeks?”

You’d wondered how long it was going to take Suzy or any of the other Eliminators to ask you what your name was. “Lucy, my name is Lucy Marshal.”
“Heh, that’s kinda funny if you think about it. My name sounds a lot like your name.” Suzy stares at you in rapt attention. Her eyes seem to start wondering over your body. You’ve never felt so restless in your entire life as you do when this unusual Super is staring you at.
“Actually our names sound nothing alike.” You respond.
“Maybe not for people with normal tongues but some of alien races I’ve meet have really long tongues so they roll their S’s when they speak. ” Suzy says then sticks out her tongue as far as she can. Then she attempts to say your name with her tongues hanging out of her mouth.
“Sluzy, Slozy, Luscy.” Spit sprays you from her bad attempt at alien speech. You bring up your hand to block some of the spittle from adding to the already drying amount already on you. Then you notice it, with Suzy’s tongues sticking out you can see right down her throat. Your lips go dry and your pulse soars. You can see it expand and tighten with each word she spouts out. You move in closer to get a better look. It seems impossible to imagine that your whole body traveled down that gullet not long ago. It looks so small and soft. Your face has neared Suzy’s face that you can smell her minty fresh breath. You wonder if she slipped a breath mint after swallowing you or if her breath was another of her powers that the Internet hadn’t mentioned. You’re shocked out of your deliberations when you feel something wet and slippery swab at your nose. Blushing, you sit back into the drives seat away from Suzy and her intriguing mouth. You think back to what had happened, now that you can think more clearly you realize that Suzy had licked your nose. You turn back to the playful girl, who is sitting up strait, her arms wrapped around her knees and that silly grin that suits her so well plastered on her face.
“Sorry, you looked too good not to taste.” You just nod your head; glad that she hasn’t asked why you were leaning towards her. With a turn of the keys you speed out of the Eliminators parking lot. Your passenger rocks back and forth in her seat while humming to herself. Hopefully you can get some answers when you reach Suzy’s apartment.

13212112211112.content:
You ponder things as carefully as you can, but your brain is just too dazzled right now.
"Um, look can I take a rain check, I mean this is all so... I really didn't expect to get in just like that!"
For a moment you think you see a brief flicker of annoyance on Slurpina's face, then she sighs shaking her head.
"I'm sorry, Guess I am a bit much for you all at once huh?"
For a moment you frown. Did she say...?
"Aaaanyway, you have a good night's sleep and be here at 8AM sharpish. Don't want to upset the little people, right?" she winks and heads out.
That was it? You're in?!?
Slowly, and somewhat dazedly, you walk out the room.
"Um, I'd change if I were you." says a voice from behind you "Unless you want to attract an entirely different class people to your 'rogues gallery'."
You turn and see the kid in the gray flight suit you saw earlier; Captain Sky. He does look rather young to be a Super Hero, maybe late teens at a guess.
"I'm sorry?" you say, still a little slow after all the excitement today.
"Your method of.. *ahem* entry to our little base here wasn't exactly without effect on your clothes." he points to your back.
Looking over your shoulder you see four tears in your jogging suit running from your shoulder blades right down to your tush!
"Oh my!" you gasp. "Erm, thanks Sky. Is there anywhere to change? In fact is there any change of clothes here?"
Captain Sky chuckles.
"Oh I think we'll have something your size, and please, call me Scott. We only use pseudonyms on the street and for the press... Except for Freak. Don't think even Greeny knows her real name."
He holds his hand out to you smiling.
"Pleased to meet you Scott," you say, shaking his hand, "My name's Lucy, Lucy Marshall."
"So, Lucy," Scott says, while he shows you down a corridor, "Given any thought to a moniker for yourself?"
"Err, I hadn't even thought about it actually." you mutter.
He grins while showing you to an unmarked door which he opens for you.
"Well, my personal suggestion is think long and hard about it, but first get a download from the Government website of all registered names. Trust me you don't want a lawsuit from some Super Girl from Manhattan who claims you stole her identity!"
Inside the room you see the layout of what looks like a hospital room; Medical bed, cabinets of drugs and a large unidentifiable machine that looks distinctly medical... and has a large radiation hazard label on it.
"Here, we have some spares in here." he says opening a cupboard. "Don't think your quite Suzy.. sorry Slurpina's size, but I think Freak's will fit OK. They're all stretch to fit anyways, and frankly Freak doesn't use her costume much with those power armor things she uses."
He turns back showing you a jet black full body costume with gray collar, wrists and ankles, and also a small version of their logo on the left breast. Small like that it doesn't look too bad, though some color on such a stark suit wouldn't go amiss!
"There are chambers you can change in back there." he says, pointing to a tiled area of the room where a corridor leads off.

14.content:
For a while you just stare at the pamphlets the doctor gave you. Most are just on 'Responsible Use of Powers' or similar issues. One however covers 'Tau IDs', the governments program for recording who has powers. Before you had just ignored all the controversy over the IDs, now some of the arguments you vaguely heard on the news come back to you. Mostly people were talking about 'Big Brother for Supers' or similar issues, but there was also a lot of talk about the endless red tape that a Super had to go through to use his powers anywhere outside his/hers home. People had said this was just a method to force anyone with Powers into a formally recognized group, either a Super Team, or local community group for Ords as these had allowances to lessen government 'tracking' (the government needing you to tell them whenever you move ANYWHERE at all!) of individuals.
With a sigh you gather up everything of yours here and change into your own clothes. After the usual form filling and paying the clinic's bills you find yourself on the streets once more heading home.
So what are you going to do? If these 'Community Tau Groups' have lawyers to deal with the red tape rather than you having to that may be an idea. You could try to get a lawyer yourself, but that would cost a lot. As soon as you think of money you wonder, is there any way you can make your powers work for you in a higher paying job? You'll have to look up Ord jobs in the web when you get home.
As you walk to your car you try to feel how you are walking, trying to sense what the doctor was saying about your increased muscles, increased mass and the inherent problems with stopping. You can feel that your gait is a little changed, but you'd barely noticed. Somehow your body was adjusting to your changes without you really knowing it was doing it.
Shaking your head you hope there isn't too much to figure out about all this.

Self absorbed as you are you don't notice the signs till a crash sends spatters of plaster from above you. Glancing up you see a garishly clad figure in a crater in the wall. It looks like he was thrown there. Wait, you recognise him. The blue and green clashing suit, the black goggles, the long black hair. It's the Scrambler!

For a moment you pause, but maybe you could could help? Scrambler is hardly an 'All American Hero', more of a good vigilante, but he is still a hero in a lot of people's eyes. You see the flare of his energy pulse scatter the green figure around him all asundry.

Somehow you also know that you can do three things with her, assimilate her, or in other words suffocate her and digest her body assimilating her powers into you, alter her in any way mentally or physically you wish and then release her, or simply release her. You know you can not just release her so that leaves the other two choices.

As you are thinking about your options Christina starts crying. "Please don't assimilate me, change me alter me do whatever you feel you need to do but please don't kill me."

Your thoughts are disrupted by her cries, that and the fact that you are not hearing her with your ears but with your mind, it seems that after a bit of time in your stomach you forma mental link with the subject.

With that information you decide to:
14221112.title: No, you can't do this. You'll hold her ...

choices: Try and sneak her home for some fun.
Have her hide in an alley while you go get her cloths.
142211121.content:
You decide that you will definitely need a side kick and she just volunteered. As you come to this conclusion your feel your will seeping into her mind and her body. You decide to keep her features the same, however her mind is altered. She is now your obedient servant, she will do whatever you ask from now on no matter how crazy or perverse it might be. As you cough her up, she turns to you and drops to her knees and hugs onto you. "Thank you mistress for not assimilating me, I did not want to die. I will serve you in all ways, I am now and forever yours."

You look down at your new side kick and are taken by how attractive she actually is, she had a nice firm body, ample breasts, long honey blond hair and the bluest eyes you have ever seen. What to do now? you are on a rooftop with a completely naked fourteen year old girl hugging against you while a super and two villains continue to fight above you.
142211121.title: Change her mentally and make her truly yours

choices: Hmm, I don't stretch enough yet. Wait till my powers grow.
Damn! That was easy! What else I could swallow?
145.content:
The trip home is a little bit of a blur, your mind wheeling over the ramifications of the day's events. You park your car in your driveway and stagger into the kitchen, collapsing exhausted into a chair.
"What a day!" you mutter "I'm a Super all right, but no spandex badguy whupping for me!"
With a dejected sigh you kick open the fridge next to you and reach for a beer... then stop.
Something the doc said to you just clicked. What was it? Or rather what just triggered that thought? Did you just see something in the fridge?
You scan the shelves but see nothing except milk, eggs, some cheese and a thawing turkey joint that...
"Oh my!" you say, realising that was it. The doc said you could stretch a lot everywhere and your digestion was more efficient and worked only on dead organic material. Somehow your subconscious had latched onto that and you just know, are absolutely positive, that you could swallow that turkey joint whole!
You reach in and pull it out (though you still don't feel super strong yet as you heft the weight of it) and sit it in your lap. It's still a little cold, but no longer frozen at least.
Can you really manage this?
145.title: Getting home.

choices: Look in the kitchen.
Why limit it to food? Look elsewhere.
1452.content:
You aren't really sure about this. I mean, he did say you could stretch but could you really swallow a turkey whole?
Sitting there, staring at the thawing bird, you ponder.
"Well, I don't exactly loose anything by trying do I? If I don't stretch then I just put it back."
It takes several more minutes of sitting there staring at it before you get the courage up to try. Why is this so hard? After all it's just a different way of eating what was going to be food anyway!
Taking a deep breath you lift it to look you in the eye and lick your lips.
"OK bird, this'll be the last daylight you'll be seeing! At least I hope so."
So saying you open wide and pull it towards your lips.... and in! Suddenly you find your lips closed about your wrists, your hands still holding the turkey! Blinking you pull your hands out and swallow. Squelching noises come from your neck, but the bulge vanishes into your body leaving not a bulge in sight. With one eye closed you concentrate, feeling it slide down and plop into your belly leaving a cool lump in there.
"My god!" you gasp, patting your still flat tummy. "That was so easy! What else could I manage?"
1452.title: Scratch one turkey!

choices: Hmm, that stuffed animal is mostly cloth & stuff?
Why just organic? Try the recliner!
14522.content:
Wait, why limit yourself to food? That was pretty much the largest thing in the kitchen and you want to see how much you can stretch!
Standing up, a new spring in your step, you stride into the living room and look around, grinning.
14522.title: Next!

choices: *Knock knock* it's a lady from the Super ID department.
You swallow the chair with ease. What next?
145222.content:
As you look around for something in the living room to swallow you realise you are limiting yourself. Why just eat organic stuff? OK, so your body can only DIGEST dead organic stuff, but that doesn't mean you can't swallow other things.
Your eyes fall on the recliner. It's old and delapitated and tends to spring upright if you don't push back hard on it. You've been wanting a new one for ages now, why not treat yourself to a new chair and do away with the old one in style!
Grinning you crouch down in front of it. OK, it's mostly metal frame but your body will probably digest the cloth and stuff. You aren't sure what it'll do with the foam filling. Is that organic? You think it's synthetic. Well, whatever it was it's food now!
You move over behind the recliner and bend over the back, opening wide.
145222.title: Recliner on the menu.

choices: Worry about it later, first a quick snooze.
Hmm, how about a car? Nawww, surely that's too big?
1452222.content:
"OK, OK, easy does it!" you mutter, then lean over and open wide.
It's surprisingly easy, and the chair back slips into your mouth and down your neck. It's harder to get the angle right and you end up doing a hand stand with your feet waving in the air to let it slide in. Slowly your lips ease over the cloth till they bump the arms.
'This is where it gets tricky!' you think and swallow... 'Or not!' as your lips stretch massively across the breadth of the chair!
With a thump you tip over backwards, upending the chair and leaving you crouching on the floor. It only takes a few gulps to suck the square body of the chair towards you and into you, the shape rather awkward forcing your neck to bend upwards. You strain against it and... *CA CLICK!* it reclines.
'Ahhhh!" you think 'That's easier!"
One more gulp and your lips are crossing the foot rest and you hear the click of your jaw closing once more. Straining you tip over and look in the glass cabinet to see your reflection. The view is incredible! Your neck is swollen unbelievably but it looks like only the top button of your dress has popped open, the huge bulge of the chair again disappearing into your body. You watch in awe as a few gulps send the chair to oblivion, your neck squeezing back to normal.
Sitting up you check and you seem normal, and normal weight too! You can feel the heavy mass of the chair inside you, but you can stand easily! It seems intact in there, no gurgling or anything. Then you remember what the doc said; your stomach does nothing now, it's lower down that digestion happens. Guess you'll have to wait a while to see how it deals with the chair. Eating it took a little longer than the turkey but was also surprisingly easy. How big a thing could you swallow?
1452222.title: One less chair to worry about.

choices: Maybe it wouldn't hurt it. Try someone's car.
Head out to find something else big to eat.
14522222.content:
You suddenly get a vision of your compact car sliding down your throat!
"Oh no, surely not?" you gasp. "But, well, could it be possible?"
Walking to the window you peer out at your car, a small four door thing, a little on the cheap side but it's worked well for you. Well you don't really want to destroy your own car anyway. But could you really swallow something that big? If so what to test it on? Another car? But that would be destroying someone else's car, you couldn't do that! The alternative would be to find something else equally big that no-one would mind going missing.
14522222.title: Big stuff!

choices: VW Bug.
SUV.
145222221.content:
Well, your stomach is safe for stuff now, you could eat someone's car then cough it up afterwards, right? Just to prove you can do it.
You straighten your clothes, do up your top button and head out to find a meal.
This street is pretty empty right now, but there are two cars here you could try. One is a yellow VW bug, and the other is a red SUV.
145222221.title: Go for the car!

choices: You can eat it then cough it up before she awakens.
Stop now, ease off before she wakes up!
1452222211.content:
Well the SUV looks a little big for a first car, try the bug. Should slide down a treat! Besides, you kind of like the color.
You try to act non-chalant as you head over to the car. The street is dimming in the evening light but the street lights haven't come on yet. Perfect time to sneak out for a meal. Hopefully no-one will notice this.
Crouching down infront of the car you spread your lips wide and take in the bumper. Sucking your mouth spreads hugely, easing in the metal body. It doesn't taste that good, metal tang and all, but this is more for the challenge not taste. Maybe try an elephant later? If it had been washed first it might taste nice?
Well, for now you just concentrate on your current meal. Wedging forwards you get your jaw under the wheels with a little difficulty, but manage and slurp over the hood gradually.
Your teeth scrape a bit going over the windscreen wipers, but then you are sliding over the windshield. This is going well! It doesn't even feel tight!
That's when you see her, a woman about twentyish laying on the back seats a blanket thrown over her. Oh god what do you do?
1452222211.title: VW snack.

choices: No one must know about this. Let nature take it's course.
Let her know what's going on. Maybe you can cough her up?
14522222111.content:
Oh shit! Well, it's to late now, besides things you eat seem unharmed inside you so better get this over with quickly before she wakes up!
Gulping hard the windshield disappears into you and you ease over the smooth curve of the body. You try to make sure you don't shake it too much so as not to wake the girl, but it is difficult to avoid a little juddering. After easing past the rear door handles you feel the back wheels slipping over your teeth and your lips start to squeeze down the slope of the rear window. With one satisfied slurp the bumper pops into your jaws and your head returns to normal size.
"My god, I actually did it!" you gasp, sitting on the pavement panting.
Blushing you button up the top of your shirt and stand up. It feels awkward, the extra mass of the car inside you throwing your movements off, but as the doctor said you can't feel it's actual weight. Weird!
With an odd gait you stagger back to your house, close the door and collapse into your sofa.
"Phew! Thank god no-one saw me!"
"What the hell?" comes echoing from inside you.
Uh oh, the girl's woken up! What now? You can feel her trying the car doors and you have to squeeze your stomach to stop her from opening them.
14522222111.title: Scratch one VW bug!

choices: She's a good girl! Yummy!
Bad girl! Punishment!
145222221111.content:
You hold the doors of the car shut with your stomach muscles for a time, pondering the situation.
"OH GOD! Where am I," the woman shrieks from inside, the sound making your insides vibrate slightly.
'Hmmm....I could digest her,' the thought sneaks into your mind. No one saw you swallow the car...
"Hello? Is anyone there?"
You've made your decision.
"Yes, I'm here. My name is Lucy and you're in my stomach."
"What? How is that possible?"
"I have Tau powers, and you're my first victim! Congratulations! Now you can either get out of the car like a good girl or I can crush the car with you inside!"
What's this woman gonna do?
145222221111.title: Birth of a Super...Villain?

choices: Cough her up, if you can
Mere prey has no choice in the matter
1452222211111.content:
You hear a faint whimper come from inside you, then the muffled sound of the car door opening. You smile, finding a slightly disconcerting amount of delight in this situation.

"Good girl," you say, patting your flat belly as you feel the woman emerge into your stomach. "It's nice to know you're going to make this easy."

"What are you going to do to me?" you hear the woman ask nervously from inside you. In your mind's eye, you can see with perfect clarity what she must look like by now. You giggle wickedly, imagining the fear and doubt on her face.

"It should be pretty obvious, hm?" you tell her, smiling down at your unchanging abdomen.

You hear her gasp fearfully as realization hits her.

"No! NO!" she cries desperately from within you. "Please, don't! I don't want to die!" she begged you, even as you felt your nearly vestigal stomach start slowly churning. "There's so much I wanted to do, yet! I...I...I don't want to die!"

What do you do?
1452222211111.title: She's a good girl! Yummy!

choices: Sarah starts struggling
Sarah tries to make the best of a bad situation
14522222111112.content:
You laugh, enjoying the rush you're getting from holding this woman's life in the palm of your hand -- or the pit of your stomach, as the case may be. Her desperate pleas are only making you more excited to digest her.

Your smile widens, and you leisurely begin walking back to your house.

"What's your name?" you ask the woman idly, feeling lighter than air with morbid giddiness.

"Sarah..." you hear her whimper, "Sarah Anderson."

"I see..." you say as you step through the door back into your house. "Well, Sarah, you must have gotten the wrong impression about your situation if you think begging will change anything," you tell her pleasantly, body filled with a euphoric sensation as you feel the things in your stomach start slowly moving down to your upper intestines.

You hear a faint whimper, then a sigh.

"...will it hurt?" Sarah asks you after a long pause. "...being digested, that is?"

"I wouldn't know," you respond bluntly. "You're my first victim, like I said before."

Sarah is silent after that.

What happens next?
14522222111112.title: Mere prey has no choice in the matter

choices: Sarah is making her own fun
Digestion just feels THAT good
145222221111122.content:
For a while, there is nothing but the sound of your digestive organs churning as digestible organic matter is pushed down to your lower intestines, where most of the digestion will take place. You have never felt so aware of the path your food has taken before, but you find that you can picture vividly in your mind the state and location of your prey.

But then, after some time has passed, as you are getting ready to take a shower before going to bed, you suddenly hear something more than just the sound of churning muscles coming from your lower abdomen. It is faint, at first, but you definitely hear the sound of a woman moaning.

As you turn the nozzle on the shower head, having discarded your clothes on the bathroom floor, you hear the moaning continue to grow in volume and intensity. At first, as the hot water runs over your skin, soothing your sore muscles, you think Sarah must be finally starting to digest.

But then, as the moaning continues to grow even louder, you realized that those are not moans of pain, but pleasure. Self pleasure, if your intuition is right.

Are you right?
145222221111122.title: Sarah tries to make the best of a bad situation

choices: I am showing you what is happening to me
You are somehow absorbing my powers
1452222211111222.content:
Despite what your intuition would have had you believe, Sarah was not doing anything to pleasure herself. No, she was simply lying halfway absorbed into the walls of your lower intestines, her body slowly dissolving as she was gradually digested.

You could see the image of what was happening quite clearly in your mind, Sarah's clothes long dissolved, leaving her completely naked as she was broken down and absorbed, little by little. She was yet alive, and it seemed that the digestive process was incredibly arousing for her, from how lewdly and loudly she was moaning.

Briefly, though, you wonder how you are able to picture it so clearly. Sure, you've always had a powerful imagination, but this seemed too vivid to just be something like that...

You are not the only super on this block. You suddenly hear a voice in your head say. I was also examined at the Tau clinic... I possess the power of insight, which grants me perfect awareness of my body, and telepathy, which allows me to communicate with the minds of others. And...
1452222211111222.title: Digestion just feels THAT good

choices: You swallow the rest of the SUV.
Someone interrupts you.
1452222212.content:
You think you know the guy that owns this SUV, not a great guy at all. He's let his dog (you think encouraged him!) make messes all around the neighborhood and has generally been thoroughly annoying. Yeah, maybe he'll get insurance out of this, but it'll still inconvenience him... and put his premiums up!
OK, this might be a challenge, better start at the front as that's a nice slope compared to the flat back. Glancing around to check that no-one is about you kneel down in front of the vehicle and open wide. Just as with the recliner the bumper slips in pretty easy. Stretching over the hood gets a little tight, but not bad. As your upper lip glides across the windscreen your teeth get caught in the wiper for a moment, but you get by. An oily taste gets stuck on your tongue and you aren't sure you're ever going to do this again, not a great taste. With one more stretch you pass the windscreen and sigh through your nose. You've stretched wide enough to take it all! You can do it!
1452222212.title: SUV.

choices: Sleep it off first, work the rest out later.
Well, how about a semi?
14522222121.content:
Ease, swallow, stretch, gulp, it takes a few minutes but surprisingly is only a little tight, no pain at all. Soon the back wheels scraped over your bottom lip and you get past the rear windshield. Slowly you gulp, closing your mouth past the SUV, feeling it jerk and jink down your throat. It pops two top buttons off your shirt but your jaw returns to normal size and you sit upright, feeling the huge weight of the SUV settle in your stomach. A little rolling and it rights itself in there with a shudder as you sit on the pavement.
"Mmmm, different, quite..."
UUUURRRRRRP!
the reverberating burp echos around the empty street.
Quickly you jump to your feet and run inside, sure someone heard that. It's just as tricky as the doc said to stop and you crash into your door. It's also difficult to turn and change direction, but you manage. Slamming the door behind you, you slump on the couch (you almost tried to sit on your recliner before you remembered!) and relax. Phew, what a day, but is that the limit to how big you can chow down on? It didn't seem hard at all.
14522222121.title: You swallow the rest of the SUV.

choices: Somehow your stomach DOES manage to digest metal.
You wake to the burning need to take a dump. The SUV is coming out!
145222221211.content:
This is way too much for one day, best figure what else you can manage later.
You wash and clean your teeth head to bed and strip, not bothering to get into your nightdress, and dive into bed. You're still amazed that the weight doesn't crush the bed flat. It did jerk as you dropped onto it... inertia you guess, but it managed. Soon such thoughts drift away and you sleep soundly.
145222221211.title: Sleep it off first, work the rest out later.

choices: You waken to very loud noises coming from inside you!
You sleep through it. It's loud, but not terrible.
1452222212111.content:
It's a small room, and the sheets are thoroughly tangled at the moment, wrapped around your naked body as you toss and turn in your sleep. Noises are emanating from your belly as it tries to deal with it's contents. A wince crosses your face as the recliner is squeezed from your stomach to your intestines and starts to slide down. As it gets deeper a gurgling rumble adds to the thumping noises and slowly it's stripped of it's fabric. Your body even absorbs the foam seating, but that leaves the frame and springs. You toss more, tensing and feeling your bowels clench awkwardly. Your body is trying to deal with it's contents and soon enough it finds a way. Crunching noise cut into the night as your intestines squeeze tighter, crushing the chair down to size, and slowly the metal frame is absorbed into the intestines.
One last gurgle and the recliner is no more, not a trace left. Then the SUV starts to exit the stomach. This time you REALLY wince, but don't waken. It's tight, but your stomach and intestines start to adapt. After this it should be easier. With a loud plop the SUV is dumped into your intestines and starts it's way down.
1452222212111.title: Somehow your stomach DOES manage to digest metal.

choices: The next day you decide to try something bigger.
Why you can't feel the SUV? Naww, surely you can't have digested it?
14522222121112.content:
*Gurgle gurgle gurgle GURGLE BLUP!* echos from your belly, sort of like a quiet washing machine.
Your intestines seems satisfied as the SUV continues it's decent, squeezing it down methodically, then slowly increasing pressure. Another wince from you and you turn over as a cracking sound comes from your belly. The windshield crunches as the roof slowly caves in.
*Urp.*
Writhing a bit you relax as the burp seems to help. Meanwhile the SUV is getting a rougher time of it, squeezed and compressed the frame buckled, burnt and partially absorbed the sounds from your belly now seem like a muffled series of long explosions and crunches. It takes a while but about an hour later the noise level diminishes to a mild stuttering crunching as the frame finally succumbs to your digestion. The engine block is the last to go, finally absorbed piecemeal with a gurgle that makes the windows rattle.
"Ungh, wha?" you mutter, briefly woken by the noise, but then drift back to sleep again, finally feeling better. A few more gurgles emanate from inside, but die away to nothing in a few minutes to leave no trace the car ever existed.
14522222121112.title: You sleep through it. It's loud, but not terrible.

choices: Gobble up a gasoline truck?
Scarf down something else?
145222221211122.content:
You wake up a little while later, and stagger to your feet. Feeling thirsty, you move to the fridge, and open the door to grab the OJ in there. As you down the carton, you feel something suddenly touch your arm.

Glancing down, you mutter "what the heck?" as you see the cause of the odd feeling - a magnet from the fridge somehow slipped onto your arm. You pull it off, but notice it seems... attracted to you. Even your fingers.

After a little experimentation, you remember your big meal and your eyes widen in shock. Your stomach is no more "attracted" to the magnet than your thumb... somehow, you've managed to digest and absorb all that metal, and it's gone and distributed all over your body.

You start noticing other, subtler changes. You're stretchier (from the rubber maybe?) and stronger (maybe just from all that weight, but maybe it's because of the metal and other stuff you absorbed too). With the weight evenly distributed throughout your body, you also find it far easier to move than when the weight was all in your belly.

"So much for organic only," you think with a laugh. Not only can you digest anything, but it adds itself and its characteristics to your body. You briefly ponder eating a jet (well, maybe a small one!) so you'll be able to fly... but then you realize it's not as if you're faster like a car - you'd probably have gotten the same results if you'd eaten just a bunch of disassembled car parts. Then again, that wouldn't be so bad, especially since you still don't know your upper limits yet.

Suddenly you feel a powerful burp coming on, and you let it rip, reverberating loudly throughout the house. Pressure you didn't even realize was there relieves suddenly, as your burp lasts for over two minutes. When it ends, you sniff the air... "burnt gasoline," you realize in amusement, deducing the car must have had pretty close to a full tank... and it exploded inside you. Not all at once, perhaps, but eventually.

This calls for a test, you realize. Just how indestructible are your insides, anyway? Perhaps it's time to kill two birds with one stone?
145222221211122.title: SUVs do a body good

choices: Yup, just this once! After that no more stealing and eating!... probably.
You can't do it. Maybe you can buy a load of gasoline and swallow it?
1452222212111221.content:
OK, that would technically be stealing? Maybe? Well definitely.... but, could you do it? And what if the owner caught you? There is no way you are going to eat someone just to stop them reporting you. Besides, even if you can digest metal and rubber you still can't digest living flesh. The doc was pretty adamant about that. Where could you get a truck without the driver and with no-one to watch? A Motel? Truck stop? Something like that would work.

As you think you get dressed and end up looking on the map for the nearest truck stop... then pause. Maybe the nearest OLD truck stop would be better? No surveillance to record your deed! Do you really want to do this? I mean, sure it'll prove your insides are incredibly tough... but it will be not only stealing but... property damage? Yeah, more pangs to your conscience!
1452222212111221.title: Truck Dinner.

choices: Yup, and it's ALL yours! Yum!
No, but there is a truck carrying a house. It's HUGE! Over 70 ft long!
14522222121112211.content:
The idea is just too good to pass up. Heck, insurance will probably pay for it. Does insurance cover acts of gullet? You chuckle and finish dressing and head out. It's still dark out so you try to head to the truck stop quickly. You park a little way up the street from the onramp and head up on foot. It's just starting to get light in the east as you get there, and the place is a dump, just as you thought! These guys definitely aren't paying for surveillance!

You try to act casual as you approach. After all, just because you can't see anyone around doesn't mean someone can't see you. If you snuck around carefully and someone DID see you, well it's pretty much guaranteed that they'd remember and wonder what the hell you were doing!

At the back of the place there is a huge lot, rather dark right now, but there are a few trucks there. You look around to see if there is a gas truck nearby.
14522222121112211.title: Once, but never again. No siree!

choices: A large boom echoes inside you... and you're fine! *BURRRP!* Ahh, that's better!
It explodes... and knocks you out. You wake later feeling awful! Hospital maybe?
145222221211122111.content:
It's a beauty, white tank with a blue logo (can't quite make it out in the dark, and to be honest you don't care), and a large 'sleeper' behind the cab. It's parked between a couple of other trucks and you sneak between them and stand there making sure you can't be seen. Well, if someone happens to be in the woods directly in front of the truck, maybe. Otherwise you're free and clear!

You stretch, crick your neck... or try to. It doesn't seem to want or need to now, or be able to to! Too stretchy! Chuckling you approach your breakfast and unbutton the top of your shirt, just to be safe. Opening wide you slurp up the corner of the cab... then pause. Ooh, a nasty thought just occurred to you. You'd assumed that anyone parking here would be going into the Truck stop to sleep... but they might not. Someone could be asleep in the cab! Letting the bumper go you climb up and peer inside. After perusing several windows you have a pretty good view and find it clear. Phew! That was a relief!

Getting back to breakfast you quickly suck on the corner and pause. It seems to taste a little better than the SUV. Maybe you're getting a taste for metal? Shrugging mentally you gulp, heaving your lips over the front of the truck, stretching obscenely large over the bulk of it. It seems a lot easier than you'd guessed and soon your lips stretch up once more over the windscreen. The vertical exhausts are a bit of a pain, but you slide over one pair on the right past the cab and feel a sudden jolt as the cab tilts down into your huge interior. Oh god, your insides being bigger on the inside act like a pit for this thing! It's falling down into you! Your shoes scrape across the tarmac as the thing tips further inside you, drawing you forwards! You lean back, trying to stop but with a thunk your belly is pitched to the ground, the back of the trailer heaving upwards above you. Gasping you feel it surge in, stretching you tight in there, SOOO tight!

It grinds to a halt, still sticking about ten feet above the other trucks. Oh god, someone is bound to see it! Gulping hard you suck it in, but it's getting incredibly tight in your stomach. Reaching up you can grab handholds on the frame, yanking it down as fast as you can, stuffing it in. Rear tires squeak over your lips and with a few more hefty gulps your lips close over the rear of the tanker. It's a squeeze stuffing it down your throat, your stomach REALLY complaining about the stretching it's getting, but finally it plops inside completely!

Gasping you pant on the ground, feeling it settle inside you. You sit up, finding it hard... and harder to stop moving! With a gasp you fall flat on your back. Inertia is a bitch! A little more carefully you sit back up and then stand, a little shakily. You manage to get out of the parking lot without falling over, and hopefully without being seen! You settle back into your car and start up, but driving is a git! You really have to hit the gas to get the thing moving now! And braking! Better plan ahead! You go easy, but manage to get home in one piece. A couple of times you felt yourself slide hard to one side as you rounded a corner too hard. Do that too much and you'll tip the car over next time!

Staggering out of the car you head inside and collapse on the sofa. You sit there, exhausted but happy, gut full of gas truck. You can't believe you actually did it! You've eaten a whole truck! That's totally...

*GURRGLE!*

Uh oh. You feel a tenseness inside you, then a tightness. There she goes! That's quicker than usual, maybe the stomach empties quicker if it's stretched more? Slowly the huge truck squeezes out of the stomach and into your intestines. It's tight, but not as bad as the stomach had been and you slowly grin as your overly stuffed stomach relaxes. With a happy gurgle it empties it's burden and your intestines start to ripple, drawing the huge vehicle deeper and starting to clench on it.

This is the acid test! Can you cope with this? Were you totally insane to even contemplate it? Well, it's a little late for second thoughts now!
145222221211122111.title: Gasoline truck Breakfast.

choices: Enough big things, you need some normal food for a bit.
You go out to try out your improved strength!
1452222212111221111.content:
You can feel it squeezed deeper, an incredibly odd feeling, especially when it rounds a corner and is pushed uphill!
